text: Ana nehu'na kagri ha' vahetamina hanuge'za zamagra'a zamavufaga nene'za, waini tima neneno neginagi hiaza hu'za, zamagra'a korana nene'za neginagi hugahaze. E'inama hania zana maka ama mopafi vahe'mo'zama nege'za, Nagrikura hu'za Jekopu nagamofona hankavenentake Anumzana Agrake Ra Anumzana mani'neankino naga'a zamagu'vazino ete nezamavarea Anumza mani'ne hu'za ke'za antahi'za hugahaze.
